headline: Assessing Marathon Petroleum After A 381.5% Five Year Surge And Recent Pullback
summary: If you are wondering whether Marathon Petroleum is still a smart buy after its huge run over the last few years, or if the real value has already been priced in, you are not alone. The stock has cooled off recently, down 8.8% over the last week and 11.0% over the past month, but it is still up 23.3% year to date and 381.5% over five years. Recent price swings have come as energy markets stay volatile and investors reassess refiners in light of shifting fuel demand, regulation, and capital...

headline: Marathon Petroleum Corp. Names Maria A. Khoury as Chief Financial Officer
summary: Marathon Petroleum Corp. (NYSE: MPC) today announced that Maria A. Khoury will join the company as Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, effective January 19, 2026. Khoury will succeed John J. Quaid, who will remain with the company for a period of transition.
